title: Help! – I love this 60's crafted font!
content:
Does anybody out there recognise this?

[http://www.citrobe.org/2cv1967.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034004/http:/www.citrobe.org/2cv1967.htm "http://www.citrobe.org/2cv1967.htm")

It looks like it is custom drawn to me?

Cheers.

[http://www.simonjonesdesign.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034004/http:/www.simonjonesdesign.com/ "http://www.simonjonesdesign.com/")

comments.content: which font are you referring to?

I was referring to the large ’2’ image.

Ta.
